document.discussion_title: Holiday Of A Lifetime winner looking forward to jetting away to the Algarve
document.topic_text: Holiday Of A Lifetime winner looking forward to jetting away to the Algarve 09:00, 22 Aug 2016 Kathleen Rigby won holiday with Genting Casino in Southport after Shares Get daily news by email Genting Southport Holiday of a Lifetime winner Kathleen Rigby celebrates her win The winner of the Genting Club Southport ‘Holiday of a Lifetime’ competition is excitedly planning her trip to the Algarve with her husband and family. A regular customer at the casino, Kathleen Rigby was delighted at being announced the winner, never having scooped a prize of this magnitude in a competition before. Kathleen said: “When I entered the competition I never thought for a minute that I might actually win. “When I found out I felt delighted and surprised all at the same time. Even now, when I think about it I can’t believe my luck. “We love to travel and this will mean we already have a fantastic trip to look forward to next year. Top news stories 1 of 4 “I would like to say a big thank you to Genting for such a lovely prize.” Visiting the Genting Club in Southport a couple of times each week, Kathleen enjoys the relaxing and sociable atmosphere which the casino offers, reminding her of how she feels when away. She added: “The Southport casino is in such a lovely setting and there is a very warm and welcoming atmosphere. “Whether you want to play or just pop in for a drink or a lovely meal at the Fahrenheit restaurant it has something for everyone – it really is like being on holiday.” Read More Are you in our Southport Flower Show Ladies Day photos? General Manager, Paul Smith said: “We were very pleased to see the prize go to one of our regulars. We hope that Kathleen and her husband have a wonderful trip and can’t wait to see some of the photos from her time away. “Genting Club Southport offers one of the ultimate nights out in Southport, with all of the favourite casino games on hand including American Roulette, Blackjack, Three Card Poker and Electronic Roulette.” The Genting Club Southport is open daily from noon to 6am.
